attributes.action: Restrict Cabinet appointments to those with proven expertise for their post
attributes.additional_details: The (perceived or otherwise) levels of competence of, and therefore Public confidence in, UK Government Ministers - is beginning to threaten Democracy itself.   Covid-19 and other recent National setbacks demonstrate that the process by which Cabinet appointments are made has become a recipe for National disaster.  It needs to change.  Job-seekers need to compete based on proven, recognised skills and experience of use to society, it is time for all UK Politicians to do the same.
attributes.background: Any Prime Minister appointing future cabinet roles, to justify their decision based upon a maintained public register of the specific areas of expertise of the appointee - including reference to detailed track record examples from that register that demonstrates integrity & fitness for appointment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand you'd like a new process for Cabinet appointments, but we're not sure how decisions on appointments would be taken. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
